Posts.EditableText: Well If anything can help me I'm still having a very seriousl problem. I cannot use any item's on anything in game. I have no idea why. I use the Edit "Use" details script option. I put in use item on item. I make my script for it. When i run the game it doesn't aknoledge the item i'm using it on. It says you can't see that here. It is definatly in the correct room. It is definatly after the item is in possesion. I just can't use it. Someone help please. "~COUGHS~ Alex"
Posts.HTML: Well If anything can help me I'm still having a very seriousl problem. I cannot use any item's on anything in game. I have no idea why. I use the Edit "Use" details script option. I put in use item on item. I make my script for it. When i run the game it doesn't aknoledge the item i'm using it on. It says you can't see that here. It is definatly in the correct room. Posts.EditableText: NVM. It was a bug. My whole program was comprimised i had to start it over now all use items work.
Posts.HTML: NVM. It was a bug. My whole program was comprimised i had to start it over now all use items work.

Posts.EditableText: Glad you found the cause.
